meanings.definition: The condition of having flowers with the same style length.
meanings.sent1: In the garden, the homostylies of the flowers made them look very uniform.
meanings.sent2: Botanists study homostylies to understand how plants reproduce.
meanings.sent3: The flower competition only allowed entries with homostylies, causing some creative arrangements.
meanings.sent4: Her bouquet displayed a perfect homostylies, symbolizing harmony and balance.
meanings.sent5: The textbook explained homostylies with colorful illustrations for easy understanding.

meanings.sent1: The homostylies of the plant species fascinated the researchers.
meanings.sent2: Understanding homostylies helps in classifying different plant varieties.
meanings.sent3: The homostylies of the flowers led to a funny mix-up at the flower shop.
meanings.sent4: The homostylies of the garden reflected a sense of unity and cohesion.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used a fun game to explain homostylies to the students.
